title: So I can only pink ward one side of mid lane verse Eve jungle so I have to afk farm...
body:
Your only other option being Green wards in her Jungle so you can at least know where she is at some point and then when her camps are done there's a good 5 minute period of not knowing where she is during which I have to afk farm again.

She's a team fight Champ that punishes trading and early game...

replies.body: a squishy melee champion who does no early game damage whose only CC is a meager slow that does fuck-all and grants a weak ass shield excels in teamfights? Nah i dont think so.

Evelynn needs a buff with her passive anyway she should be invisible for ever until she attacks uses an aggressive spell or is silenced.
#Riki Dota2

Counters to Eve: {{champion:4}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:107}} 
Twisted Fate ultimate counters Evelynn's stealth, Lee Sin can reveal Eve and Rengar's ult grant true sight of enemies and will affect Eve if she is in range. These are the few counters i can think of for now. Other than that just ward the pink ward the high traffic area like the baron bush and the dragon bush. Also Eve obviously can't be at different places on a map at the same time so just play aggressive when she is at the other side of the map. {{champion:421}} Tremor Sense counter Eve too.
She has the some of the weakest combat prowess in the entire game unless she gets ahead. She hits as hard and is as squishy as a Janna is in the early game.
